WHO WE ARE

INNOVATIVE

FIRST OPEN SEA LIVING

People live in boats, many travel on cruises, yet building homes and living in the open sea is not an option for the masses. SeaTop Homes is the first concept of its kind enabling living and prospering in the open sea.

MODULAR DESIGN

Similarly to a camera and a tripod, a SeaTop Home could mount on unipole- or tripod-bases offered in any SeaTop Village in the world. Moving with your home is as easy as towing a boat or shipping a container.

COMPLETE ECO-SYSTEM

When you join the SeaTop world you enjoy a complete different lifestyle. You can buy your home online, furnish and decorate it, meet new people and socialize in village and shore events, move your home to a new location, and more.

FUN

SEA SPORTS

Sail, kayak, skidoo, waterski, snorkel, scuba dive, swim - outside or inside your village.

ANIMAL ENCOUNTERS

In addition to your own pets.. fish, feed birds and watch dolphins from your balcony!

VILLAGE & CITY EVENTS

The shuttle to the Broadway show in downtown is leaving in five minutes, no rush, no parking.

CONNECTED

CELLULAR AND WIFI

Connect your home either via your own cellular modem or through SeaTop Village's WiFi network to access Phone, Internet and TV...

VILLAGE SHUTTLE

Whether you need a ride to the shore or bring your groceries home the village shuttle can be booked to help.

DRONE DELIVERIES

Living near a city or supply stores near the shore, you can order pizza or fly in a parcel using drones.

SUSTAINABLE

OFF GRID, NET ZERO ENERGY

All loads including lighting and appliances in SeaTop homes are powered by low voltage DC and run for 3 days from a battery without charging. The home's roof collects solar energy and the turbine in the rear of the house collects wind energy and charge the home's battery.

WATER DESALINATION

A water desalination unit provides fresh water for drinking and showering. Sea water is used for toilet flush and exterior cleaning in order to save water.

WASTE DISPOSAL

The bottom of the house contains recycle, garbage and compost bins that could be services from the sea by waste collection boats.

SAFE

SAFE SEATOP LIVING

A floating house at sea might make you seasick. A house built on multiple poles has exposure to currents and winds. SeaTop Home is installed on a unipole or a tripod resulting in minimal wind and current drag while providing a stable, long-lived base.

HOME AUTOMATION & SECURITY

Each home is equipped with home automation to control temperature, lighting, access control, security cameras, multi-room audio, home direction and energy consumption all remotely controlled.

STORM MODE

When a severe storm is on its way, secure the home and its contents in Storm Mode and evacuate to the shore.

STYLISH

AERODYNAMIC DESIGN

SeaTop Homes' aerodynamic shape are designed to minimize wind drag but also to look modern and timeless. The roof fin by default enables turning the house towards the wind for the turbine to capture wind and turn the balcony unexposed to the wind.

CONFIGURABLE INTERIOR

When you order your SeaTop home online, you can configure every room and finish for walls, furniture and appliances to what suits your needs and style.

MODERN LUXURY

Modern design elements are implemented for the interior and exterior of SeaTop homes to reflect luxury, quality and longevity while still keeping simple lines and low weight.

FRIENDLY

ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY

SeaTop Homes are built using environmentally-friendly materials. When installed their foundation blend to the bottom of the sea, non-disruptive to flora and fauna. Net Zero energy operated, recycle and waste disposal serviced SeaTop Homes is designed with the environment in mind.

COMMUNITY FRIENDLY

SeaTop Homes owners are all sea lovers alike who live and share a SeaTop Village community based on liberal, diverse and friendly guidelines.

SeaTop Homeowners and off-shore Village operators develop business ties and social relations with local on-shore service providers and communities.

USER FRIENDLY

SeaTop Homes were designed to be user friendly and simple to haul, install, operate, maintain and service.

Multiple home systems are automatized and remote controlled.

SeaTop Village services are resident friendly to enable utility, comfort and outstanding experience.

FLEXIBLE

BUY A HOME AND A SPOT

Own your dream home in a dream location for years to come

BUY A HOME, RENT A SPOT

Own your dream home and migrate from one SeaTop Village to another

RENT A HOME OR A VILLAGE

Book a week for your family or team anywhere in the world to enjoy SeaTop living
